name: why-did-you-update
description: Patch React to discover unecessary re-renders

scripts.test: npm run test:react:14 && npm run test:react:15
scripts.test:react:14: npm i react@^0.14 react-dom@^0.14 && nwb test
scripts.test:react:15: npm i react@^15 react-dom@^15 && nwb test

author: Gabe Scholz
